text: Falling in Love is a 1984 American romantic drama movie set in New York City. It stars Meryl Streep, Robert De Niro and Harvey Keitel. This movie was released in autumn 1984 in the United States. Category:1984 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Falling in Love
